story.text: We were pointed to the open source release of Motion Canvas. Delight burst forward after a moment of studying the example function makeScene(). We see immediate associations between this expressive use of generators and our own 20 year old animation language. [https://motioncanvas.io/ site] [https://github.com/motion-canvas/motion-canvas github] [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H5GETOP7ivs youtube]

YOUTUBE H5GETOP7ivs
Motion Canvas is now open source.
[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H5GETOP7ivs youtube]

In 2003 I re-created an animation of a vanishing point in javascript and SVG.  The original animation was built with AutoCAD 10 and custom AUTOLISP scripts I created in the fall of 1990.  Happily amazed that 15 years later this code runs unchanged in modern browsers. [http://dobbse.net/thinair/2003/12/vanishing-point.html blog]
